resources.string: Way For Life is a registered Non-Government Organisation started and maintained by Youths of various colleges for development of the society.Way For Life conducted its first event on 30/04/2017 and from then conducted events every alternate Sunday’s. Way For Life was registered under Trust on 25/09/2017 which was almost after 5 months from the day it was started, within the 5 months Team Way For Life successfully completed 12 events.

For every 1rs we receive
 -50ps will be spent for improvement of Govt school.
 -35ps will be spent for education of road side kids.
 -15ps will be used for Cleanathon(Swachh Bharath).
The main motto of this "Ensure that no body dies for the want of something that in abundant in everyone body".
Volunteer With Us to make the society Better
